body: So, when is Wheat No.2 coming?

Gomu-Gomu-Bukakke! haaha, that's indeed hilarious. For an artist who have never watched the series before I am damn impressed with the art. There are artist out there who ACTUALLY have watched the series and can't draw nearly as good as this guy. Although, I believe his art would be better if he had watched the show. ^^
Loved this, the artwork was great and the subtitles were big enough for me to see on my small phone
